title: Scene Timeline Data
description: Schema for the non-linear timeline scene data

delta.description: Time offset from time 0. Supports single units (e.g., '5 days', '-2 hours') or combined units (e.g., '7 days 17 hours', '2 weeks 3 days'). Can be null if exact time is unknown - scene will be placed by its position in the array.

images.description: Array of image paths (must start with /images/)

tags.description: Array of tags in key:value format. Allowed keys: episode (number), season (number), character (capitalized), location (capitalized), theme (capitalized), time (capitalized)
